spells.name: Contagious Flame
spells.description: Scorching rays cause 4d6 fire damage, then move on to new targets.

spells.name: Enemy Hammer
spells.description: Allows you to telekinetically use a creature as a weapon.

spells.name: Fluid Form
spells.description: Gain DR 10/slashing, increases reach 10 ft., and breathe water.

spells.name: Getaway
spells.description: Teleports you and select creatures to predetermined location.

spells.name: Sirocco
spells.description: Hot wind does 4d6 damage, fatigues those damaged, and knocks creatures prone.
